author: ebrondol
body:
The main goals of this PR are:
- update the TrackerTopology in order to have access of the stack info: I have added methods to access to the glued/stack info for each different strip subsystem (isStereo, isRPhi, isLower, isUpper). Moreover, the methods Glued() and Stack() returns the DetId of the double module itself.
- get the step3 run into the new geometry.

In order to do the second point three steps are needed:
1) fixing the Geometric Tracker Search introducing the stack concept and removing the DetsBrother
2) building the TrackerGeometry with a new GeomDet, which is StackGeomDet
3) adding in MeasurementTracker the possibility to build TkStackMeasurementDets

Moreover, the two cfg files that produces the clusters have been changed, just to temporary fix the workflow - another PR is requested to @thomaslenzi to fix it definitively.
title: Introducing Stacks in CMSSW geometry (part II)
